name: OCTOKINGS
description:
A giant Octopus and his army attacked you! You are in charge of the defenses of the city, Captain. Your Queen put's her faith in you to repel the invasion.

Build buildings and send your units to patrol the city. Redeploy your units wisely to defeat this giant monster in this flavourful tower-defense/base building strategy game. Remember: DEATH ISN'T THE END and more dangers await you in this fantasy-journey!

CONTROLS

lx click on unit = open redeploy window

lx click on hospital = see the range

mouse wheel = zoom in/out


CREDITS

Programming - Axiom GameLabs

Art - cokyfish

Axiom GameLabs Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCG7hPd9zygq7bqK--evM-EA
